pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with the Prime Minister António Costa | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Yesterday, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met with the Prime Minister of Portugal, António Costa. Both leaders are in London for the NATO Leader’s Meeting.

The Prime Ministers congratulated each other for successes in the recent elections in Canada and in Portugal.

The two leaders discussed the central role NATO plays in Euro-Atlantic defence and international security. They exchanged views on global issues, including climate change and the importance of sustainable economic growth, as well as the situation in Venezuela. Prime Minister Trudeau and Prime Minister Costa look forward to continuing to work together.
